name: spellout
0:
”Alexa ask spell out”
”how do you spell psychology”
”spell psychology”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spell out
des: How many times your kids asks you for a spelling of a word and how many times you say "I think it is...". Well try this Spell Out and simply say the word and it will spell it out. Simple isn't it :)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
